page.title: 13COUNTESTHORPE EMPLOYMENT
page.content: In the county area, the percentage of unemployed is 11% male and 7% female. This is about average for this country at the moment. Most people work outside of Countesthorpe in places such as G.E.C. The industry of Countesthorpe has a total workforce of around 300,the clothing industry contributing mostly to this,with Goulds knitwear having 65 employees,and a further 60 at Ashers hoisery. There are a variety of small industries along with 18 shops and the schools offer a further 300 jobs.
